blogData.title: How Video Transcription Works Explainer
blogData.description:
We have been working really hard on our app. We have added a new architecture
  to our video processing, a few more languages as well as changes to the look and
  feel of the product. All in all, we felt it was time for a new explainer video which
  covered how to use the platform.
blogData.keywords: ai transcription, ai translation, ai translator, ai localization, how video transcription works, how to get captions for a video, how to get subtitles for a video, how to use AI to caption a video, how to use AI to subtitle a video, video translator explainer, youtube subtitles, video caption, youtube captions

data.richContent:
We have been working really hard making a number of changes to our underlying application. Specifically we have (i) added a new architecture to our video processing, (ii) added a few more languages, (iii) large number of changes to the look/feel of the product.

All in all, we felt it was time for a new explainer video which covered how to use the platform.

Here it isâ€¦ enjoy!

How To Transcribe A Video Using AI

Conclusion

Technology is offering us ways to look at old problems with new eyes. We should look at open captions as a tool - something good for accessibility, and for boosting your bottom line.

Please connect with us on LinkedIn, YouTube or Facebook for any comments, questions, or just to keep up to date with the work we do!

We are very grateful for your support!

If you are interested in trying out our technology, please try our platform, or drop us an email at hello@videotranslator.ai.

nodes.title: Our Journey with SBIR Phase 1: Enhancing Healthcare Accessibility for CALD Communities
nodes.description: VideoTranslatorAI's journey for the NSW Small Business Innovation & Research (SBIR) program for the feasibility study began!
nodes.coverAlt: Our Journey with SBIR Phase 1: Enhancing Healthcare Accessibility for CALD Communities

nodes.title: VideoTranslatorAI Wins Feasibility Study for NSW Small Business Innovation & Research Program
nodes.description: VideoTranslatorAI wins NSW SBIR 2022 feasibility study, focusing on AI for healthcare in CALD communities. We are excited to contribute to a more inclusive healthcare in NSW.
nodes.coverAlt: VideoTranslatorAI Wins Feasibility Study for NSW Small Business Innovation & Research Program

nodes.title: Unraveling the Unique, Inclusive Language of Indonesia
nodes.description: Bahasa Indonesia, the official language of Indonesia, holds a special place in the hearts of its people. Its evolution and distinctive features make it a language that stands out in the world of linguistics. In this blog post, we'll embark on a journey to explore what makes Bahasa Indonesia so unique.
nodes.coverAlt: Unraveling the Unique, Inclusive Language of Indonesia
